question: Display engineering classes and design classes with projects related to sustainability.
sql_query1:
SELECT Engineering_Class.name
FROM Engineering_Class
WHERE Engineering_Class.Projects = "Sustainability Project"
UNION
SELECT Design_Class.name
FROM Design_Class
WHERE Design_Class.Projects = "Sustainability Project"
sql_query2:
SELECT Engineering_Class.name
FROM Engineering_Class
UNION
SELECT Design_Class.name
FROM Design_Class
WHERE Design_Class.Projects = "Sustainability Project"
interpretation1: What engineering classes and design classes are currently working on sustainability projects?
interpretation2: List all engineering classes and also show design classes focusing on the sustainability project.
